update.name: JEM Package
update.changes:
JEM 2.3.5 released on November 7 2022. First JEM version offering PHP8 compatibility. Please refer to the change log for details.
If you use template overrides please note that all views have been changed and there is a good chance that your overrides won't work as expected. So please check the changes and adapt your files. Versions previous to 2.3.2 will not install correctly on Joomla 3.10.1!
This version of JEM is not yet compatible with Joomla!4. You will have to wait for JEM 4.x for that!
